item.title: StackBank 1
Telemetry
item.description: Telemetry Description: Elia has just developed a brand-new website to analyze logs at runtime üßª. Confident in his security skills, he bet his entire house that you won’t find the hidden flag… Will you prove him wrong? üè†üîç Introduction Fourth round of the Cybercup 2025 ulisseCTF I want to show the writeup of the first web, a really interesting challenge. Source The application is a simple Flask app with 0 css (we almost like it).
